pages.text: $(item)Slag$() is a byproduct of smelting ore in a $(item)Bloomery$() and hammering a $(item)Bloom$().$(p)$(info) $(item)Slag$() that contains ore can be compacted and reprocessed in a $(item)Bloomery$().
A $(item)Slag Heap$() that does not contain any ore can be fired to create $(item)Slag Glass$().
